articles.description: Ryan Reynolds shared a long-lost letter he meant to send a fan back in 2016, though it had plenty of suspiciously wrong predictions about the future.
articles.content:
He welcomed his third child with wife Blake Lively in 2019.
But Ryan Reynolds just rediscovered an old letter to a fan that he jokingly said he forgot to send in which he claimed his second child wo… [+4548 chars]
